title: JCR: Inter Arma Silent Leges? Democracy, Domestic Terrorism, and Diversion
description: Danya Migdali, editorial assistant at SAGE, interviews author Dennis Foster about his article "Inter Arma Silent Leges? Democracy, Domestic Terrorism, and Diversion" published in The Journal of Conflict Resolution.
content:encoded: Danya Migdali, editorial assistant at SAGE, interviews author Dennis Foster about his article "Inter Arma Silent Leges? Democracy, Domestic Terrorism, and Diversion" published in The Journal of Conflict Resolution.
